}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"AML-A311D-CC-V1.0C"'' is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Amlogic|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' A311D (ARMv8-A 64-bit) :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.2GHz :+ Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.8GHz :NPU: 5.0 TOPS @800MHz (on A311D only) *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' MP4 @800MHz (OpenGL ES 3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, eMMC module socket, :TF card (128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM ([[Micron]]) *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 3.0 (Type-A) ports, :1x USB 2.0 (Type-C) port *Power: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C), PoE header
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/11/09/libre-computer-aml-a311d-cc-alta-sbc-features-amlogic-a311d-ai-processor/ ''Libre Computer AML-A311D-CC “Alta” SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/libre-computer-targets-edge-ai-and-computer-vision-with-alta-its-latest-cottonwood-sbc-1c4e7540be6d ''Libre Computer Targets Edge AI and Computer Vision with Alta'' on '''hackster.io'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/libre-computer-unveils-amlogic-powered-aml-a311d-cc-alta-sbc/ ''Libre Computer Unveils Amlogic-Powered AML-A311D-CC Alta SBC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Models=== *[[Libre Computer Alta]] (AML-A311D-CC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0 • AI Accelerator *[[Libre Computer La Frite (1GB)]] (AML-S805X-AC) • 1GB/2GB • [[Amlogic]] S805X *[[Libre Computer Le Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Sweet Potato]] (2GB) (AML-S905X-CC-V2) • 2GB, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Renegade (1GB)]] (ROC-RK3328-CC) • 1GB/2GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Renegade Elite]] (ROC-RK3399-PC) • 4GB, GbE, USB 3.0, 64-bit, 4K Media *[[Libre Computer Solitude]] (AML-S905D3-CC) • 2GB/4GB, GbE, USB 3.0 *[[Libre Computer Tritium IoT]] (ALL-H3-CC IoT H2+) • 512MB • 32-bit *[[Libre_Computer_Tritium_H3]] (ALL-H3-CC H3) • 1GB • 32-bit • [https://libre.computer/products/boards/all-h3-cc/ PPage] *[[Libre Computer Tritium H5]] (ALL-H3-CC H5) • 2GB • 64-bit
